title: Anticipator

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select a player to have their night ability process and resolve at the lowest possible priority.
- During the day, choose to nullify your attributes tonight.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- While you are alive, all night actions will be processed as soon as they are sent in. This attribute can cause a player to be killed in the middle of the night before they can perform their night ability.
- Any persistent abilities will linger until the end of the night (e.g. a protective role will defend against any attacks sent in after the protection, a Veteran on alert will kill all players who visit them after they go on alert).
- If you target a player who sent in their night action before you did, your ability will fail.
